app_id.label: Facebook App Id
app_id.description:
You should create a facebook app to get app id. https://developers.facebook.com/docs/apps/register
For example: 1451966991726173

app_id.label: Facebook App Id
app_id.description:
You should create a facebook app to get app id. https://developers.facebook.com/docs/apps/register
For example: 1451966991726173

width.label: Width
width.description: The width of the plugin. Either a pixel value or the literal 100% for fluid width. The mobile version of the Comments plugin ignores the width parameter, and instead has a fluid width of 100%. Default: 550

number_posts.label: Number Posts
number_posts.description: The number of comments to show by default. The minimum value is 1.

link_color.label: Link Color
link_color.description:
Choice Color
For Example: red, green, blue, yellow
Hexa Code: #FF0000, #FFCCC..

border_color.label: Border Color
border_color.description:
Choice Color
For Example: red, green, blue, yellow
Hexa Code: #FF0000, #00FFFF...

user_id.label: User ID
user_id.description: Find Your ID at (idGettr)

widget_basemagento.name: Ves Base : Magento Blocks
widget_basemagento.description: Generate Magento Blocks: header, breadcrumbs, left_first, left, right, footer_before, footer

custom_block_name.label: Or Input Block Name
custom_block_name.description: Input a block name to render

custom_template.label: Custom Template
custom_template.description: Load Custom Template For The Block. For example: page/html/header.phtml Empty for default

title.label: Widget Title
title.description: This tile will be showed as header of widget block. Empty to disable

addition_cls.label: Addition Class
addition_cls.description: This class is used to make owner style for the widget.

stylecls.label: Widget Box Style
stylecls.description: These classes are bootstrap typo contextual color classes

heading_class.label: Widget Title Class
heading_class.description: Input css class for widget heading title

contentclass.label: Description Class
contentclass.description: Input css class for widget content

file.label: Image File
file.description: Enter image path or use holder image (ex: holder.js/300x200 ). Example: subfolder/image_name.jpg.The "subfolder" is child folder in your_webroot_folder/media/

image_size.label: Image size
image_size.description: Enter image size. Example: thumbnail, medium, large, full or other sizes defined by current theme. Alternatively enter image size in pixels: 200x100 (Width x Height). Leave empty to use 'thumbnail' size.

alt.label: Image Alt Text
alt.description: Input the text for alt attribute of image tag (it is for SEO optimizing)

self.label: Load in the same frame as it was clicked

top.label: Load in the full body of the window

title.label: Widget Title
title.description: This tile will be showed as header of widget block. Empty to disable

addition_cls.label: Addition Class
addition_cls.description: This class is used to make owner style for the widget.

stylecls.label: Widget Box Style
stylecls.description: These classes are bootstrap typo contextual color classes

thumbnail_mode.label: Render Thumbnail
thumbnail_mode.description: Whether to render thumbnail with cropping-resizing function

enable_thumb.label: Enable Popup Thumb List
enable_thumb.description: We should enable system config Pages Builder > General Settings > Enabled Helper Fancybox Thumbs

use_custom_button.label: Use Custom Popup Buttons
use_custom_button.description: We should enable system config Pages Builder > General Settings > Enabled Helper Fancybox Buttons

slideshow_speed.label: Popup Slideshow Speed
slideshow_speed.description: Sets the speed of the slideshow, in milliseconds. Default: 2500

source.label: From Source
source.description: Choose Source to render image and content in the slideshow

image_folder.label: Input Image Folder Path
image_folder.description:
Image Folder Path Setting(this folder put in media/ )
For example: gallery its mean folder path media/gallery

link_1.description: Input Link To Page For Image

image_1.description: Input image url link (include http) or image path (which stored in the folder Media)

product_id_1.description: Input Product Ids which will show on the image as lookbook. Input multil id with comma. For example: 20,22,30

default_items.label: Number Columns On Page (Default)
default_items.description: Show number items when screen size between 1199px and 980px

mobile_items.label: Number Columns On Page (Phones)
mobile_items.description: Show number items when screen size bellow 480px

tablet_small_items.label: Number Columns On Page (Phones to Small tablets)
tablet_small_items.description: Show number items when screen size between 641px and 480px

tablet_items.label: Number Columns On Page (Phones to tablets)
tablet_items.description: Show number items when screen size between 768px and 641px

portrait_items.label: Number Columns On Page (Portrait tablets)
portrait_items.description: Show number items when screen size between 979px and 769px

large_items.label: Number Columns On Page (Large display)
large_items.description: Show number items when screen size 1200px and up

custom_items.label: Custom Number Items with any screen sizes

interval.label: Speed
interval.comment: Determines the duration of the transition in milliseconds.If less than 10, the number is interpreted as a speed (pixels/millisecond).This is probably desirable when scrolling items with variable sizes

block_template.label: Custom Module Template
block_template.description: Input custom module template file path. For example: ves/base/gallery_carousel.phtml Empty for default

title.label: Widget Title
title.description: This tile will be showed as header of widget block. Empty to disable

pretext.label: Pretext
pretext.description: Empty for hide. You put html code such A, H2,H3,H4...

catsid.label: Choose Categories
catsid.description: Choose categories will show on frontend

page_limit.label: Categories Per Page
page_limit.description: The maximum number of categories in each page (default: 3)

cols.label: Colums In Categories carousel
cols.description: Number columns of categories in each page (default: 3)

template.label: Widget Template
template.description: Input custom module template file path. For example: ves/base/categories.phtml Empty for default

simple_template.label: Product Simple Template

block_template.description: Input custom module template file path. For example: tag/popular.phtml Empty for default

block_name.label: Block Name
block_name.description: Input related block name. For example: widget.reports.product.viewed

block_template.label: Template
block_template.description: Input custom module template file path. For example: reports/product_viewed.phtml Empty for default

block_name.label: Block Name
block_name.description: Input related block name. For example: widget.catalog.leftnav

block_template.label: Template
block_template.description: Input custom module template file path. For example: catalog/layer/view.phtml Empty for default

widget_related_products_block.name: Related Products Block
widget_related_products_block.description: Create Related Products Block. Show only on product page

block_name.label: Block Name
block_name.description: Input related block name. For example: widget.product.related

block_template.label: Template
block_template.description: Input custom module template file path. For example: catalog/product/list/related.phtml Empty for default

widget_upsell_block.name: Upsell Products Block
widget_upsell_block.description: Create Magento Upsell Products Block. The block just show on product page.

block_name.label: Block Name
block_name.description: Input upsell block name. For example: widget.product.info.upsell

block_template.label: Template
block_template.description: Input custom module template file path. For example: catalog/product/list/upsell.phtml Empty for default

widget_sitelogo.name: Site Logo
widget_sitelogo.description: Create Magento Site Logo On Header

template.label: Template
template.description: Input custom module template file path. For example: ves/base/site_logo.phtml Empty for default

block_template.label: Template
block_template.description: Input custom module template file path. For example: page/template/links.phtml Empty for default

title.label: Widget Title
title.description: This tile will be showed as header of widget block. Empty to disable

addition_cls.label: Addition Class
addition_cls.description: This class is used to make owner style for the widget.

stylecls.label: Widget Box Style
stylecls.description: These classes are bootstrap typo contextual color classes

template.label: Module Template
template.description: Input custom module template file path. For example: ves/base/carousel.phtml Empty for default

slide_by.label: Slide By
slide_by.description: Number Items will slide on a time. Default: 1

default_items.label: Number Items On Page (Default)
default_items.description: Show number items when screen size between 1199px and 980px

mobile_items.label: Number Items On Page (Phones)
mobile_items.description: Show number items when screen size bellow 480px

tablet_small_items.label: Number Items On Page (Phones to Small tablets)
tablet_small_items.description: Show number items when screen size between 641px and 480px

tablet_items.label: Number Items On Page (Phones to tablets)
tablet_items.description: Show number items when screen size between 768px and 641px

portrait_items.label: Number Items On Page (Portrait tablets)
portrait_items.description: Show number items when screen size between 979px and 769px

large_items.label: Number Items On Page (Large display)
large_items.description: Show number items when screen size 1200px and up

custom_items.label: Custom Number Items with any screen sizes

fx.label: Transition effect
fx.description: Important: Leave empty to use simple horizontal scrolling animation.

autospeed.label: Autoplay Speed
autospeed.comment: Set speed of autoplay when enable auto play option. Determines the duration of the transition in milliseconds.If less than 10, the number is interpreted as a speed (pixels/millisecond).This is probably desirable when scrolling items with variable sizes

interval.label: Slide Speed
interval.comment: Determines the duration of the transition in milliseconds.If less than 10, the number is interpreted as a speed (pixels/millisecond).This is probably desirable when scrolling items with variable sizes

cms_1.description: Use CMS static block for accordion content
